name: bream
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of fish that can be eaten, found especially in lakes and rivers
chictype/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages sea bream
a fish like a bream that lives in the sea: Sole, sea bream, and lobster also feature on the menu.
